ComicInfo.Title: If Everyday People Were Stand-Up Comics; Charmed Rope; Pow U.; Baseball Hall of Shame; If Dolphin's Day Ever Comes!; If Other U.S. Wars Were as Controversial as the Vietnam War!; If Modern Personalities Had Written the Great Classics!; Paranoia News; Cracked Specialized Books of Etiquette; If California Moved into the Pacific...; The Brainy Bunch
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Hudd and Dini escape out their window with a rope but the guard charms the rope like a snake and it returns them to their cell.
A satirical look at the U.S. Revolutionary War and U.S. Civil War.
Classics retold, including Huckleberry Finn by Charles Schulz, the Invisible Man by Hunter & Brinkley, Sherlock Holmes by Captain Kangaroo, Alice in Wonderland by Rowan & Martin and Frankenstein by Phyllis Diller.
The steel ball around a convict's leg eats the convict's lunch.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:37:41. [Issue ID 250450]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charlie Rodrigues,John Langton,Vic Martin,Tony Tallarico,John Severin,Bill Ward,Oskar Blotta Jr.
ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Rodrigues,John Langton,Vic Martin,Tony Tallarico,John Severin,Bill Ward,Oskar Blotta Jr.
